attributes.action: Urge the Peoples Republic of China to grant autonomy and freedom of conscience to the people of Tibet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tibetan culture, which has been a unique spiritual influence in the world for hundreds of years, is now subject to what the Dalia Lama calls "cultural genocide". Atheistic China is determined to rub out an ancient tradition that is irreplaceable. If you want to encourage the Chinese government to give freedom of belief and freedom of conscience to an oppressed people, please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
